comments:
Exception is thrown when debug the event hanlder class [0800]

2.2.0.v20070622-1102

1.New a report and insert a label to layout 
2.Map the label to attached  Label1Impl.java
3.Set a break point in Label1Impl.java ,then debug

No exception is thrown
